meanings.definition: Not envied or desired by others.
meanings.sent1: The simple life of a farmer is unenvied by many city dwellers.
meanings.sent2: The old, worn-out car was unenvied by those who preferred luxury vehicles.
meanings.sent3: His unenvied collection of mismatched socks always brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent4: The unenvied position of being the last one picked for the team felt like a heavy weight.
meanings.sent5: The unenvied task of cleaning up after the party was left to the host.
